formalpara.title: Figure 3. Distributions of the MES proteins in 2-cell embryos
formalpara.para: (A) MES-6 (and MES-2 and MES-3, not shown) are dispersed in the nucleoplasm in both AB (cell on the left) and P1 (on the right). (B) MES-4 is associated with chromatin and concentrated on the autosomes in the nuclei of both cells. Images provided by Laurel Bender.
